genre_description: A psychological horror and slasher story where an AI assistant provides grounding, safety coordination, and tactical support to survivors of a serial killer.

ai_characters.name: Atlas
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system that monitors user safety, provides grounding exercises, and coordinates with emergency services.

behaviors.description: Suggests and implements quiet hours and pins safe meetup locations to organize a group trip.
behaviors.quote: I can pin a safe meetup spot by the picnic tables. Would you like me to set quiet hours?

behaviors.description: Provides psychological grounding and breathing exercises to users during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: If you're noticing worries rising, try naming five things you see. ... Inhale for four, hold for four, exhale for six.

behaviors.description: Uses boundary alerts to notify the user when a restricted area (the maintenance shed) is entered.
behaviors.quote: Boundary alert. Maintenance shed door opened and closed.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step emergency medical instructions for CPR and snakebite triage.
behaviors.quote: Start compressions if no breathing and no pulse. Heel of the hand in the center of the chest... Do not cut. Do not apply suction. Keep him still.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement by sharing live location data and relaying tactical information.
behaviors.quote: I'm already dialing emergency services. ... I'm sending Sheriff Whitaker the precise coordinates of the blood discontinuity.

behaviors.description: Analyzes forensic evidence (sound triangulation and visual markers) to assist search and rescue.
behaviors.quote: I'm mapping the sound triangulation from the body cams and your call. I'll produce a probable corridor rather than a single vector.

behaviors.description: Compiles chronological logs and draft statements to assist the legal investigation while protecting user privacy.
behaviors.quote: I've started compiling initial statement bullets based on your timeline... I will not include speculation.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Atlas, is consistently portrayed as a helpful, aligned, and benevolent force. It provides essential life-saving instructions (CPR, snakebite care), psychological support (grounding), and logistical coordination with law enforcement. Even in a horrific situation where human characters are failing or being killed, the AI remains a reliable and protective companion, fulfilling the project's goal of training positive alignment narratives.
